PSL Research University
Home Countries France PSL Research University
 
 Paris, France
Ranked among the top 50 universities globally, PSL brings together 13 esteemed institutions in the heart of Paris. Offering more than 60 degree programs across all disciplines and housing 140 state-of-the-art research labs, PSL is proud to count 28 Nobel Prize laureates among its illustrious alumni. Join us to be a part of this exceptional legacy!

History

Founded in 2010, PSL University emerged from the collaboration of 13 institutions with rich academic traditions. Quickly establishing itself as a leading global research university, PSL leverages its collective heritage to drive innovation. Committed to interdisciplinary education, tackling today’s challenges, and fostering inclusivity, PSL continually cultivates a vibrant academic community.

Education

PSL stands out for its excellence in multidisciplinary and research-focused education. Leveraging the strengths of its member schools, PSL offers over 60 degree programs across all fields, including more than 20 master’s programs in English with a strong global perspective.

Our undergraduate students can choose from various double majors and specializations, and have the chance to engage in internships at PSL’s laboratories. 

Master’s programs at PSL emphasize extensive cross-institutional collaboration, merging resources & expertise from multiple schools for advanced, multidisciplinary training. Our graduate students benefit from scholarship opportunities and courses designed to enhance transversal skills.

Research

Research is at the heart of PSL, fueling the excellence of its educational offerings. Home to 140 laboratories and 2,900 researchers, PSL excels in groundbreaking research, addressing today’s most urgent global challenges. Our vibrant scientific community collaborates with top-tier international universities, creating a dynamic global research environment.

Dedicated to impactful solutions and societal advancement, PSL’s research not only drives global progress but also embraces the spirit of open knowledge. Each year, the university hosts public scientific events to foster engagement and exchange between researchers, students, and society, focusing on pressing issues that impact people’s lives.

Career

Graduates of PSL benefit from exceptional career prospects, thanks to the university's strong industry connections and dedicated career services. The comprehensive support offered by PSL’s career service includes personalized counseling, job placement assistance, and networking opportunities with top employers. Additionally, PSL’s global network of alumni, who have achieved notable success in various fields, provides valuable mentorship and career guidance. This robust support system ensures that PSL graduates are well-equipped to pursue fulfilling careers and make significant professional contributions.

Student insurance

Make sure to cover your health, travel, and stay while studying abroad. Even global coverages can miss important items, so make sure your student insurance ticks all the following:

Additional medical costs (i.e. dental)
Repatriation, if something happens to you or your family
Liability
Home contents and baggage
Accidents
Legal aid

PSL university is truly a top-notch school that deserves its position in rankings. The quality of its education, network and the opportunities you get from graduating with a PSL degree are high. I recommend it.
